title: African debt is not ‘crisis situation’ - Adesina
text:
African debt is not ‘crisis situation’ - Adesina 1:04pm EST - 03:31 
African Development Bank President Akinwumi Adesina says ‘no reason for alarm’ despite IMF warnings about African debt and claims Africa is the continent to invest in after Trump’s reported ‘shithole’ comment.   
African Development Bank President Akinwumi Adesina says ‘no reason for alarm’ despite IMF warnings about African debt and claims Africa is the continent to invest in after Trump’s reported ‘shithole’ comment.  //www.reuters.com/video/2018/01/23/african-debt-is-not-crisis-situation-ade?videoId=388202114&videoChannel=13421
